short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organize your LinkedIn inbox like a boss. The Linkedin pipeline extension for overview of your Linkedin messages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You get a lot of Linkedin Messages every day?

Organize your LinkedIn inbox like a boss. The extension that helps you getting more overview on your Linkedin messages. 

Assign DM to the Plinbox pipeline by giving them a status with just a click. 

How to start?
- Create an account on plinbox.com
- Select a subscription, monthly of yearly
- Download Extension
- Login to the extension with your Plinbox inlog
- Go to your Linkedin messages page
- Organize your Linkedin inbox like a boss

Have fun!

--> Only works on: https://www.linkedin.com/messaging 
It does NOT work in the Sales Navigator environment
